title: Pipeline Execution Trend List
description: List of pipeline execution trends over a time period

data.description: List of execution trend data points

startDate.description: Start date of the trend period

endDate.description: End date of the trend period

totalSuccessful.description: Total successful executions in the period

totalFailed.description: Total failed executions in the period

dataAvailable.description: Indicates if data is available from Elasticsearch

errorMessage.description: Error message if data retrieval failed
